Package aom.scripting.xs.tr

Class Chat

Object
Chat
public class Chat
extends Object
This class provides a collection of Trigger commands concerning Chats.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void trChatHistoryClear()
    Forces the chat history to reset.
    bool trChatHistoryContains​(string text, int playerID)
    Returns whether or not the current chat history contains this text of the given player.
    void trChatSend​(int fromID, string message)
    Sends a chat message prefixed with the given player's name, e.g.
    void trChatSendSpoofed​(int fromID, string message)
    Sends a chat message with the coloured icon of the given player but without their name prepended to the text.
    void trChatSendSpoofedToPlayer​(int fromID, int toID, string message)
    Same as trChatSendSpoofed(int, string), but only sent to a given player.
    void trChatSendToPlayer​(int fromID, int toID, string message)
    Same as trChatSend(int, string), but only sent to a given player.
    void trChatSetStatus​(bool on)
    Enables (true) or disables (false) the chat.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • trChatHistoryClear

      public void trChatHistoryClear()
      Forces the chat history to reset.

    • trChatHistoryContains

      public bool trChatHistoryContains​(string text, int playerID)
      Returns whether or not the current chat history contains this text of the given player.

      Can cause out of sync in multiplayer, even in a low priority trigger.

    • trChatSend

      public void trChatSend​(int fromID, string message)
      Sends a chat message prefixed with the given player's name, e.g. "Player 1: the text here".

      The exception is player 0, which results in the given line to be added as yellowish text to the chat history (normal chat is white and has a coloured icon indicating the sending player).

    • trChatSendSpoofed

      public void trChatSendSpoofed​(int fromID, string message)
      Sends a chat message with the coloured icon of the given player but without their name prepended to the text.

    • trChatSendSpoofedToPlayer

      public void trChatSendSpoofedToPlayer​(int fromID, int toID, string message)
      Same as trChatSendSpoofed(int, string), but only sent to a given player.

    • trChatSendToPlayer

      public void trChatSendToPlayer​(int fromID, int toID, string message)
      Same as trChatSend(int, string), but only sent to a given player.

    • trChatSetStatus

      public void trChatSetStatus​(bool on)
      Enables (true) or disables (false) the chat. This also prevents all other functions in this class (like trChatSend(int, string)) from working.
